name: Power Rangers Zeo: Battle Racers
description:
Power Rangers Zeo: Battle Racers is a Super NES racing video game released in September 1996 by Bandai.

The game was based on the Zeo generation of Power Rangers. It features Mode 7 graphics. The game allows for single-player or two-player split screen racing or battle mode.

GamePro's The Feature Creature panned the game, criticizing the use of split screen even in single-player mode, and the stiff controls. He scored it a 2 out of 5 in every category (graphics, sound, control, and FunFactor).
